problem2

Class Suits

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem2.Suits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Suit

    public class Suits
extends java.lang.Object
implements Suit
    Defines a list of suit names and suit symbols. Returns the suit names and suit symbols. The default order set for suit ordering is: SPADES, HEARTS, CLUBS, DIAMONDS in increasing order.
    Author:
    meghna
